---
title: "Ivy Lee method of Gets Things Done"
author: "FA"
---

The process of Ivy Lee Method of getting things done is as follows:

1) At the end of day, write down 6 tasks with priority to do the next day.
2) Start with first task and keep working on it until finished.
3) Move to next task if first task is finished.
4) Repeat the Steps 1-3.

* Spill-over of tasks to the following day is allowed.
